summary: An anthology of four short horror stories revolving around a mysterious antique shop owner and his antique pieces, each of which hides a deadly secret.
cast: Ian Bannen|Ian Carmichael|Peter Cushing|Diana Dors|Margaret Leighton|Donald Pleasence|Nyree Dawn Porter|David Warner|Ian Ogilvy|Lesley-Anne Down|Jack Watson|Angela Pleasence|Wendy Allnutt|Rosalind Ayres|Tommy Godfrey|Ben Howard|John O'Farrell|Marcel Steiner|Dallas Adams|Michael Crane|Shaun Curry|Helen Fraser|Scott Fredericks|Brian Hall
title: Más allá de la tumba
